channel.title: Posts on Practical Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Practical Thoughts

item.title: Jenkins Scripted Pipeline collection
item.description: Curated list of useful Jenkins Scripted Pipeline patterns as a complement to the official pipeline-example git repository.

item.title: Containers best practices
item.description: A curated checklist of best practices and security requirements to help running container in production.

item.title: Policy Iteration on Frozen-Lake
item.description: The Policy Iteration algorithm compute iteratively an approximation of the optimal policy $\pi_*$ by calculating the state-value function for a policy, then improving the policy maximizing the state-value function.

item.title: Policy Evaluation on Frozen-Lake
item.description: The Policy Evaluation algorithm compute iteratively the state-value function $v_\pi$ for a given policy $\pi$ for a known model in an MDP environment.

item.title: Reinforcement learning : algorithms
item.description: The introduction define the environment and it’s mathematical representation the model. Solving reinforcement learning problems can be done using different algorithms.

item.title: Reinforcement learning : an introduction
item.description: Learning by interacting with an environment is how people and animals learns. A computer or an agent can also learn the same way.

item.title: Self-signed SSL certificate for multiple domains
item.description: Creating a self-signed SSL certificate is easy, you can found lots and lots of tutorial on internet. Creating valid, multiple domains, self-signed SSL certificate is another story.
